title: cant find zzrot in urf
body: I played urf and i cant find zz rot is it disabled and if so why is it not said on the client

replies.body: They made it unavailable for URF like they do with banner of command in poro king.

Sees {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:35}} in URF

Might need to make a few adjustments before we can call URF truly fun-balance. 

_whispers_ also death timers in URF....just saying. Thanks. :D
it was more along the lines of 1 zzrot portal could cause like 4 to be up at once just by 1 person.
Why would you balance the mode? Either balance all the OP or not at all. Why shut down other champs and not the other when they are equally insane.
